product_name: REI Mossyrock Sweater Fleece Jacket - Girls'
long_description: Perfect for cold and dry conditions, the REI Mossyrock Sweater fleece jacket wraps your girl in warmth and bright style as she heads out to play in the great outdoors. The combination of lightly filled, quilted recycled polyester body and fleece sleeves creates reliable warmth. Raglan sleeves ensure freedom of movement. Full-length zipper; 3-panel hood; soft chin guard. Cozy brushed tricot lines the zippered hand pockets; zippered sleeve pocket secures small essentials.
short_description: Perfect for cold and dry conditions, the REI Mossyrock Sweater fleece jacket wraps your girl in warmth and bright style as she heads out to play in the great outdoors.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
